magpie.data.utilities.splitters

Class SingleElementGroupSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.splitters.BaseDatasetSplitter
      • magpie.data.utilities.splitters.SingleElementGroupSplitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Commandable, Options, Printable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultipleElementGroupsSplitter

    public class SingleElementGroupSplitter
extends BaseDatasetSplitter
    Split dataset into two groups based on whether it contains certain elements. Any compound that contains a listed element is placed in set 0, all others in set 1.

    Usage: <Element names...>
    Element names...: Entries containing these elements will be split into a distinct set

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
